doc:
Alvy Moore https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alvy_Moore 0 Jack Alvin "Alvy" Moore (December 5, 1921 – May 4, 1997) was an American light comic actor best known for his role as scatterbrained county agricultural agent Hank Kimball on the CBS television series Green Acres. His character would often make a statement, only to immediately negate the statement himself and then negate the corrected statement until his stream of statements was interrupted by a frustrated Oliver Wendell Douglas portrayed by Eddie Albert. One such statement was, "Good morning, Mr. Douglas! Well, it's not a good morning ... but it's not a bad morning either!" Jack_Alvin_"_Alvy_"_Moore ( December_5_,_1921 – May_4_,_1997 ) was an_American_light_comic_actor best_known for his_role as scatterbrained_county_agricultural_agent_Hank_Kimball on the_CBS_television_series_Green_Acres . His_character would_often_make a_statement , only to_immediately_negate the_statement himself and then negate the_corrected_statement until his_stream of statements was_interrupted by a_frustrated_Oliver_Wendell_Douglas portrayed by Eddie_Albert . One_such_statement was , " Good_morning , Mr._Douglas ! Well , it 's not a_good_morning ... but it 's not a_bad_morning either !
